headline: CTO @ Ajourney (YC S22) - Building a unified regional payroll platform | ex-Rapyd | ex-Grab
summary: A day a problem solved, a year you are a pro.

experiences.title: Co-Founder & CTO
experiences.description: Building a unified regional payroll platform.

experiences.title: VP of Engineering
experiences.description:
𝐌𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 (𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥)
• built the monorepo tooling that speeds up engineering team's productivity by at least 5x
• built the automated CI/CD pipeline that moves the team away from manual deployment (with the help from 2 other infra tools engineers)
• built the standard PR review workflow for both services deployment and Terraform infra provisioning
• enhanced the existing shared libraries in Go and implemented OpenTelemetry + background worker library
• migrated the team from the complicated GitFlow to the trunk-based development workflow
• migrated the team from Selenium to Playwright for writing more robust/faster e2e tests
• pushed for clearer team structure + service ownership

𝐌𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 (𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭/𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬)
• deployment is happening more frequently by at least 6x
• feature delivery total time is shortened by at least 3x
• bug fix turnaround time is shortened by at least 3x

experiences.title: Engineering Lead, APAC
experiences.description:
Managed a team to work on the feature development and bank/payment gateway integration along with constant liaising with the product/business teams in APAC region. What we achieved:

• Integrated with 7 banks and 15 payment gateways
• Implemented more than 60 payment methods and 80 payout methods

Most importantly, we helped bringing in more than 1 billion USD monthly TPV to the company from just the APAC region itself. And of course, we have a great sales team to thank who helped manifest all the technical stuffs we have built up.

experiences.title: Principal Engineer
experiences.description:
Managed a total of 12 team members(3 team leads) which the teams are mainly responsible for:

• Improve checkout flow for the customers by integrating with various payment gateway including credit cards and alternative payment methods
• Improve loyalty membership system

experiences.title: Director Of Engineering
experiences.description:
Managed the engineering team(16 ppl as of April 2018) in which I spent 70% of my weekly time on improving architecture/engineering process/tooling, 30% on managing the team workflow/happiness/career growth. And my achievements were as below:

• The tooling to setup local cluster(2 Rails API + 4 React SPA) via 2 commands for smooth and faster development cycle by utilising Makefile + Docker + Docker Compose.

• Automated CI/CD (deployment to staging/production) with Kubernetes cluster on GCP.

• Setup Datadog monitoring(with logs) for the web/sidekiq/postgresql/redis servers.

• Identity system that allows users to sign up account on the platform with 1 email address and can login to multiple different apps(brands, creators, producers) on Android/iOS/web.

• Matching system that automatically matches creators/producers to the brands.

• Adopt scrum methodology to push for clearer and more focused workflow between design + product + engineering.

• Setup engineering level + performance evaluation framework + hiring plan.

experiences.title: Engineering Lead
experiences.description: As the company was growing rapidly, so did the demand for our internal/external apps. In order to deliver the apps more efficiently, I managed to drive the company to go for SPA-API approach and grew the team of 4 to 22 in 31 months time. Aside from the technical part, my daily work also includes making sure that the team members can proceed with their tasks without any problems and guide them when needed. In my last 8 months with Grab, I was in charge of full-stack engineers hiring in which I've successfully streamlined the interview process, hired 8 engineers(out of 130+ interview candidates) and grew the team to 22.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description: Built the TheRetailHQ Analytics System using RubyOnRails, jQuery, EmberJS, D3.js, nvD3.js, HTML5, CSS3 and MongoDB which helps businesses analyse movement in any indoor or complex urban environment where GPS does not work. All analysed data are virtualised and presented in charts using D3.js and nvD3.js. In addition, also built Create Your Own Map Editor in web browser that allows business partners to easily create maps inside the web browser which can be used directly on our analytics system to get an overview of how well a certain part of a venue is doing.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Assist the users in memorising the login credentials for their common use websites. Mainly worked on the backend API and Android app.

certifications.name: Scrum Product Owner Certified
certifications.authority: SCRUMstudy - Accreditation Body for Scrum and Agile
